message: I understand you wanting to be fair, but I think this is more reflective of the declining value over time.
Considering inflation, let's meet in the middle!
The middle ground is fair, but the time pressure hurts you more than me.  Let's be realistic.
You're right about time pressure, but I won't give up yet!
We're getting close, but we need to settle this soon.  This is my final offer.
